<strong>Installing browser add-ons and extensions to provide additional functionality</strong>

Examples:
<ul>
<li>Using Adblock to be exposed to fewer adverts</li>
<li>Utilising a download manager for faster downloading with resume functionality</li>
<li>Installing Foxclocks to know what time it is around the world</li>
<li>Using Diigo to save, share and comment on bookmarks</li>
<li>Using HTTPS Anywhere to provide additional security in the browser</li>
</ul>
